name: My Friend 今天是一个特殊的日子！
greetingText: I really like your name btw! 阳历7月28号 也就是农历6月11号
wishText: May the js.prototypes always be with you! 希望你今天能拥有好的心情！;)
text1: It's your birthday!!! 今天是你的生日喔:D
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...生日快乐！
text2: That's what I was going to do.这是我给你的一点小制作
text3: But then I stopped.虽然有点简陋
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something但是这是我第一次尝试制作这些
text5Entry: Because,如果你能够因为这个小制作开心
text5Content: You are Special 那祝愿你以后都能像今天一样开心
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.可以退出了
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.你点一下的话 可以重复播放
